name: Polyventure
summary:
Polyventure: a low poly adventure, is a game based on beautiful atmospheres and lucid dreaming, to concern about endangered species and the enviroment. 
The game mainly consists to explore and feel the surrounding environment of a fantastic world. 
A magnificent experimental game made to delight your sensory system. 
 
This game can be described in this words: Walking Simulator, Indie, Short, Atmospheric, Casual Story, Abstract, Adventure, Singleplayer , Mystery, Experimental, Interactive Fiction, Horror, Psychological, Relaxing and Fantasy.
